descriptionHtml:
Are you a true Dragonborn? Shouldn\'t you be wielding a weapon deserving of that title? Now you can! The ancient enemy of dragons and compainion to the Dovahkiin, Kroniid! In the dragon tongue it means \"Conquerer\", it was created by the Aedra in Aetherius to be a weapon for the Dragonborn. The Dovahkiin alone has the power to call it forth from Aetherius. During the dragon war it was sealed away by Alduin its prolonged time away from the dragoborn caused its connection to Mundus to weaken, now it can only be called forth for short periods at a time.

The sword is located in a tower by Elder\'s Blood Peak. The tower is guarded by Vahlok, the dragon priest tasked with guarding it from the dragonboorn. To learn the power to summon kroniid simply read Vahlok\'s journal.

stats: 
Base damage: 14
Weight: 16
Speed: 1.1
Enchantment: 30 points of dragon damage
One Handed

Also check out my new Blessings of the Madgod Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38348/?

Notes: Feel free to leave any comments questions or concerns in the comments section.
author: D0VAK11N
